movie_desc_1: Newly single LA hotshot Amanda and heartbroken London journalist Iris impulsively swap houses for two weeks over Christmas to escape their romantic woes
movie_desc_2: A barista discovers her secret royal lineage after a Christmas cookie contest
stars: Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jude Law, and Jack Black

movie_desc_1: After discovering their significant others are siblings, two resentful exes must spend Christmas under one roof — while hiding their romantic history.
movie_desc_2: A corporate lawyer inherits a failing cranberry bog in Vermont, and discovers the true meaning of the holidays.

movie_desc_1: An old flame resurfaces when Mia's grandmother decides to sell the family windmill.
movie_desc_2: A retired ballet dancer must save the Sugarplum Valley reindeer parade after the mayor sprains his ankle.
stars: nobody I have ever heard of

movie_desc_1: When a snowstorm strands an archaeologist in a gingerbread-themed B&B...
movie_desc_2: Small town boutique owner Bella has an aristocratic new client...

movie_desc_1: A talented photographer stuck in a dead-end job inherits an antique Advent calendar that may be predicting the future - and pointing her toward love.
movie_desc_2: Assigned to cover the Winter Lights Festival in Cozy Pines, Alaska, a jaded meteorologist finds herself predicting love instead of snowstorms…

movie_desc_1: A young elf mistakes a tiny alien for a Christmas gift, not knowing her new plaything has plans to destroy Earth's gravity — and steal all the presents.
movie_desc_2: Disgraced figure skater Bella moves to a snowy mountain village to coach the local hockey team—and finds herself drawn to its rugged captain, Liam.
stars: a number of voice actors. It's an animation film

movie_desc_1: When her Christmas cruise ship gets stuck in the Arctic Circle, free-spirited Penny falls for a grumpy scientist who's studying polar bears.
movie_desc_2: When a young widow's magic scarf brings a dashing snowman to life, can he help her rediscover romance, laughter and holiday cheer before he melts away?

movie_desc_1: A former veterinarian turned wreath-maker rescues a runaway reindeer—and ends up stuck hosting a live nativity with the town's least festive mechanic
movie_desc_2: To save her parents' small-town nightclub, a Broadway dancer stages an all-male, Christmas-themed revue — and meets a guy with all the right moves.
stars: Britt Robertson and Chad Michael Murray

movie_desc_1: Despite working as an elf, Kate doesn't believe in the magic of Christmas. Everything changes when she meets Tom, who brings faith back into her life.
movie_desc_2: When a department store Santa calls in sick, a gruff retired wrestler reluctantly steps into the role—and ends up inspiring the whole town.
stars: Emilia Clarke, Henry Golding, Emma Thompson, Michelle Yeoh, and the songs of George Michael

movie_desc_1: An archaeologist is sent to excavate a rare Christmas artifact in the deserts of Egypt, but the cheerful local guide might hold the key to unlocking its holiday magic.
movie_desc_2: A zombie apocalypse threatens the sleepy town of Little Haven at Christmas - forcing Anna and her friends to fight, slash and sing their way to survival.
stars: Ella Hunt, Malcolm Cumming, and Sarah Swire

movie_desc_1: Meteorologist and part-time professor Ethan and his wife Addison, a TV news reporter, must come together to help save others and rescue their missing children when a tornado levels their town on Christmas Eve.
movie_desc_2: A workaholic event planner is sent to organize a tropical Christmas party in Hawaii, but the laid-back surfer helping her decorate has his own ideas about holiday traditions.
stars: Casper Van Dien. Yes. The guy from Starship Troopers. I couldn't believe it either.

movie_desc_1: When a spoiled rich kid hires a hitman to take out Santa Claus, the grizzled and world-weary Chris Cringle must fight back with everything he's got to protect Christmas.
movie_desc_2: A secret agent on a mission to stop a holiday heist ends up undercover as Santa in a mall filled with unsuspecting hostages—and one surprisingly resourceful elf.
stars: Mel Gibson and the amazing Marianne Jean-Baptiste

movie_desc_1: When a jaded barista finds a love letter hidden in a Christmas brew order, she sets out across the city to reunite two strangers—only to fall for both of them along the way.
movie_desc_2: After being released from jail, trans sex worker Sin-Dee and her pal Alexandra storm the streets of LA to get revenge on her fickle boyfriend
stars: Kitana Kiki Rodriguez and Mya Taylor

movie_desc_1: When a stressed-out dentist agrees to host her small town's gingerbread house competition, she finds herself caught in a sugary feud between two rival bakers with decades of holiday drama.
movie_desc_2: Peter asks his best friend to pose as his boyfriend on a Christmas visit home, but their plan — and feelings — change when his family plays matchmaker.
stars: Michael Urie, Philemon Chambers, and Jennifer Coolidge
